biotools.summary: tncRNA Toolkit is a pipeline, designed for convenient identification of tncRNAs. It identifies the tncRNAs using small RNA sequencing datasets. It also provides detailed information related to each tncRNA entry viz. tncRNA type, tRNA information, position on tRNA, strand, sequence, length, read count, RPM and modification site.
